alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:10PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Brownlee to 16 miles south of Thedford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Thedford, Halsey, Johnstown, Purdum, Brownlee, Elsmere, Wood Lake, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Moon Lake, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River, Norway, Natwick and Highway 83 crossing Goose Creek. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 221 and 236. Highway 2 between mile markers 201 and 229. Highway 83 between mile markers 133 and 195. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
